items.sentence: I don't think Tom is going to go to Australia with Mary next month.
I don't think there's any need for Tom to come to the office today.
I don't think that either Tom or Mary is ever going to get married.
I suspect that Tom won't tell Mary that she needs to do that today.
We suspect someone murdered Tom and just made it look like suicide.
Tom thinks that it important for Mary to learn how to speak French.
I suspect Tom and Mary aren't planning to go to Australia with you.
I told Tom that I wasn't interested in going to Australia with him.
My parents think that I'm still too young to go downtown by myself.
I don't think that Tom knows how much coffee Mary drinks every day.
